analysisEngineMetaData.name: WordNumberAnnotatorDescriptor
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
A WordNumberAnnotator creates for each token an annotation of the type WordNumber. The mapping can be given as a file and new words will be given an increasing number in order of their first occurrence. Two formats are supported as input file for the mapping. For the first input format (useSecondColumn=false) each line contains only a word. For the second input format (useSecondColumn=true) each line contains several columns which are separated by TAB-characters and the word is given in the second column. This second input format can be used for output of the WncConsumer.
This annotor expects and uses the tokenized view which can be created for example by the TokenizerAnnotator. A possible flow could contain a SentenceReader, a TokenizerAnnotator and a WordNumberAnnotator.
There are three parameters : the name of the mapping-file, it's encoding and the input-format to use.
The mapping can need a lot of RAM as every token needs to be stored.

configurationParameter.name: mappingFileName
configurationParameter.description:
File containing word number mappings. Each line of the textfile is expected to contain one word see for example http://wortschatz.uni-leipzig.de/html/wliste.html
If useSecondColumn is enabled the second column (separated by TABs) is used.

configurationParameter.name: useSecondColumn
configurationParameter.description: Setting this parameter true forces the use of the second column of the mapping file. This is useful when using the output of the WncConsumer as mapping file.
